item.description:
After a long break, we are resuming the meetups again! Hopefully this time, I have found a permanent place for us, so we can meet regularly.

During this meetup we will practice Candlelight Meditation. This is personally, my favorite! During meditation, your eyes can become sensitive. Candlelight is a soothing and natural light and can be a great point of focus for your mind. Please join me for a 30 minute meditation and discussion afterwards.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a red sign outside that says: "Revolution Books", Whole Living Center is located in the same building.
item.name: Candlelight Meditation
